displayProperties.name: Festival of the Lost Event Pack
displayProperties.description: Contains 3 Festival of the Lost accessories.

displayProperties.name: Commander Zavala
displayProperties.description: The resolute Commander Zavala advises Guardians on all Vanguard-related activities.

displayProperties.name: Ghost Shells and Emotes
displayProperties.description: Revelry Ghost Shells and emotes found in this Bright Engram.

displayProperties.name: Emotes
displayProperties.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

displayProperties.name: The Final Shape Armor Decryption
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a manipulated outcome.

Contains a random Exotic armor item first discovered in The Final Shape.

displayProperties.name: Season of Plunder Exotic Emote Pack
displayProperties.description:
Contains a set of Season of Plunder Exotic emotes.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Crimson Engram
displayProperties.description:
This engram holds Crimson Days vanity rewards.

This engram will not produce duplicates until all items for the current class are obtained. Duplicate protection excludes shaders and transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Eerie Exotic Arms Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram humming with uncanny energy. Contains Exotic arms armor.

displayProperties.name: Dance Party Bundle
displayProperties.description: This bundle contains the Teamwork Dance emote, Solstice Engrams, and a Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.

displayProperties.name: Ghosts and Emotes
displayProperties.description: Show your love for Crimson Days with these exclusive Ghost shells and emotes.

displayProperties.name: The Drifter
displayProperties.description: The name says it all.

displayProperties.name: Special Deliveries
displayProperties.description: Receive special gifts and rewards from various sources.

displayProperties.name: Eerie Exotic Legs Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram humming with uncanny energy. Contains Exotic legs armor.

displayProperties.name: Cerebral Bundle
displayProperties.description: This bundle contains an exclusive emote, a Fireteam Medallion, and shaders.

displayProperties.name: Iron Engram

An engram with complex markers.

displayProperties.name: More Strange Offers
displayProperties.description: Xûr comes and goes freely, his strange curios eagerly sought by adventurous Guardians.

displayProperties.description: Contains 3 Dawning accessories.

displayProperties.description: Festival of the Lost Ghost Shells and emotes found in this Bright Engram.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Thankful Feasting Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 4 holiday accessories fit for a feast.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Saint-14
displayProperties.description: A legendary hero and the former Titan Vanguard, Saint-14 disappeared into the Infinite Forest only to be later rescued by a fellow Guardian.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with complex markers.

Contains a random Legendary Vanguard weapon or armor piece.

displayProperties.name: Last Wish Raid
displayProperties.description: Completing the "O Deepsight Mine" quest each week unlocks the ability to purchase a previously obtained Last Wish weapon with Deepsight.

displayProperties.name: Forgotten Fortunes Pack
displayProperties.description: Get back in the fight with this selection of top-selling accessories you may have missed!

displayProperties.name: Solstice Engram
displayProperties.description: This engram contains Solstice vanity rewards—including armor glows usable only with Solstice armor sets. This engram will not produce duplicates until all items are obtained.

displayProperties.name: Fond Memories Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram containing different ornaments, emotes, and accessories from previous Destiny 2 releases.

displayProperties.name: Failsafe v{var:1065713164}.{var:2637407284}
displayProperties.description: Fully integrated H.E.L.M. AI. Failsafe is an expert on the Vex-haunted wastes of Nessus, advanced Vanguard operations, and friendship.

displayProperties.name: Failsafe v{var:1065713164}.{var:2637407284}
displayProperties.description: Upgraded H.E.L.M. AI. Failsafe is an expert on the Vex-haunted wastes of Nessus and self-reliance.

displayProperties.name: Failsafe v{var:1065713164}.{var:2637407284}
displayProperties.description: The surviving AI of a crashed Golden Age colony ship, Failsafe now safely resides in the uncrashable H.E.L.M.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any of the possible rewards remain to be collected.

displayProperties.description: Contains 3 Solstice accessories.

displayProperties.name: Valus Saladin
displayProperties.description: Saladin Forge, the last surviving Iron Lord and Valus of Caiatl's empire, oversees the Iron Banner event: trial by combat where only the strongest survive.

displayProperties.name: Pyrotechnic Pals Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 4 Bungie Day and Fourth of July themed accessories.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Remembrance of Cayde-6 Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 4 items honoring Cayde-6.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Eva Levante
displayProperties.description: No longer an outfitter for heroes of the Tower, Eva now devotes her time to making sure Guardians enjoy seasonal events.

displayProperties.name: Nimbus
displayProperties.description: The latest recruit in a long line of cybernetically enhanced protectors of Neomuna.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: Seasonal weapons and armor that are no longer available from the original quests.

displayProperties.name: Additional Rewards
displayProperties.description: Rewards earned as you level the Season Pass. Includes weapon ornaments, universal armor ornaments, and more.

displayProperties.description: An engram humming with uncanny energy. Contains Exotic head armor.

This engram holds Festival of the Lost vanity rewards.

displayProperties.name: Eris Morn
displayProperties.description: Once a Lightbearer, Eris Morn descended into the Hellmouth of the Moon where she lost her fireteam, her Ghost, and her Light to the Hive.

displayProperties.name: Frontier Emote Pack
displayProperties.description:
Contains a set of frontier emotes.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Ghost
displayProperties.description: Your Ghost has been by your side all along. No matter what.

displayProperties.name: Luminous Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram containing different ornaments, emotes, and accessories from previous Destiny 2 releases.

displayProperties.name: Shaw Han
displayProperties.description: A skilled Hunter, Shaw leads fireteams on dangerous missions throughout the solar system.

displayProperties.name: Eerie Exotic Chest Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram humming with uncanny energy. Contains Exotic chest armor.

displayProperties.name: Valentine's Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Celebrate love found and love lost with returning items!

displayProperties.description: Quests related to Seasons.

displayProperties.name: Book of the Forgotten
displayProperties.description: A tattered book filled with lost legends and forgotten folklore.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any of the possible rewards remain to be collected.

displayProperties.name: Xûr
displayProperties.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.

displayProperties.name: Materials Exchange
displayProperties.description: Rahool allows Guardians to exchange different materials and curios for Glimmer and other useful items.

displayProperties.name: Master Rahool
displayProperties.description: A senior representative of the Cryptarchy, Master Rahool decodes engrams and seeks the treasures of humanity's past.

displayProperties.description:

displayProperties.name: Dawning Focusing
